Title: There Was a Tiger
Writer: Aditya Chopra, Kabir Khan (dialogue), Kabir Khan (screenplay), Neelesh Misra (dialogue), Neelesh Misra (screenplay)
Actors: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Ranvir Shorey, Girish Karnad
Plot: Tiger, an Indian spy who goes on a mission in the UK, finds himself pitted against his own agency when he falls in love with the wrong girl.
